dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: I arrive at the hot spring facility. The building looks newly constructed, almost too clean.

dialogue.speaker: Front Desk Staff
dialogue.text: Welcome. Is this your first visit?

dialogue.speaker: Me
dialogue.text: Yeah…? I think so.

dialogue.speaker: Front Desk Staff
dialogue.text: Then please make sure to read the rules posted at the entrance.

dialogue.speaker: Front Desk Staff
dialogue.text: They are very important.
dialogue.emotion: smiling, but staring a little too long

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: Warm steam rushes toward me as I open the door to the bathing area.

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: Several visitors are already soaking in the water.

dialogue.speaker: Visitor A
dialogue.text: The water feels amazing, doesn't it?

dialogue.speaker: Visitor B
dialogue.text: Yeah. The longer you stay, the better it gets.

dialogue.speaker: Me
dialogue.text: (It looks like a perfectly normal hot spring.)

dialogue.speaker: Me
dialogue.text: I feel the water getting warmer and warmer.

dialogue.speaker: Me
dialogue.text: But my body starts to feel weird.

dialogue.speaker: Me
dialogue.text: It's almost 15 mins, but I don't want to leave.

dialogue.speaker: Me
dialogue.text: (…Wait.)

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: For just a moment, the steam thins.

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: Something cuts through the surface of the water.

dialogue.speaker: Me
dialogue.text: (That… was a dorsal fin.)

dialogue.speaker: Visitor A
dialogue.text: Is something wrong?

dialogue.speaker: Me
dialogue.text: No… I must be imagining things.

dialogue.speaker: Me
dialogue.text: (Why do their faces look… wrong?)

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: The steam thickens. The visitors' faces blur and stretch.

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: I can feel my teeth clenching.

dialogue.speaker: Me
dialogue.text: (Why does the thought of biting feel… natural?)

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: The cold spring area is quiet. The water shocks my senses.

dialogue.speaker: Me
dialogue.text: (Cold… but my thoughts are clearing.)

dialogue.speaker: Staff
dialogue.text: Cold water helps stabilize your condition.

dialogue.speaker: Me
dialogue.text: (…Condition?)

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: The staff left.

dialogue.speaker: Me
dialogue.text: This water is freezingly cold. I dont think I can stay for the whole 5 minutes.

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: The cold mist surrounds the whole pool..

dialogue.speaker: Me
dialogue.text: I can feel my body shivering, but my thoughts are getting clearer.

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: Five minutes have passed.

dialogue.speaker: Me
dialogue.text: I need to get out of here, cannot stand the cold any longer.

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: The pounding in my head slowly fades.

dialogue.speaker: Me
dialogue.text: (The rules were right. This place works… somehow.)

dialogue.speaker: Staff
dialogue.text: Please follow me.

dialogue.speaker: Me
dialogue.text: Where are we going?

dialogue.speaker: Staff
dialogue.text: To a pool better suited for your current state.

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: The room is hotter. The pool is deeper.

dialogue.speaker: Me
dialogue.text: I am not feeling too well now..

dialogue.speaker: Staff
dialogue.text: Don't worry. You'll be fine soon.

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: Something large moves beneath the surface.

dialogue.speaker: Staff
dialogue.text: You're bleeding.

dialogue.speaker: Staff
dialogue.text: (Whispering) That attracts attention.

dialogue.speaker: Me
dialogue.text: What did you just say?

dialogue.speaker: Staff
dialogue.text: Nothing, let me take you to the pool, it helps you to recover your wounds.

dialogue.speaker: Me
dialogue.text: I can handle it myself.

dialogue.speaker: Staff
dialogue.text: No.
dialogue.emotion: gripping my arm with unnatural strength

dialogue.speaker: Staff
dialogue.text: Sorry, but you need to follow me. We don't want to be sued for negligence.
